title: Orikou Yajuu ni wa Aragaenai
original_name: おりこう野獣にはあらがえない
sinopse:
Shun Uyama is a novelist who is very shy and tries his best to avoid human interaction... that is until one day when he is forced to share a room and cohabitate with Eiji Kiyomi for two weeks at a camp!

(Source: Good Girls Scan BL)
